metadata.Title: CVE-2023-1801 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: The SMB protocol decoder in tcpdump version 4.99.3 can perform an out-of-bounds write when decoding a crafted network packet.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> The SMB printer is not enabled on Debian/Ubuntu builds, so the vulnerable code isn't used.

criterions.comment: tcpdump: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
